description: A quick win: understand Design Systems: Scaling Consistency.

hook.text: Google has thousands of designers. How do they all make things that look like Google?

discovery.text: Design systems give every team the same building blocks: buttons, colors, spacing, and patterns.

twist.text: Companies that adopted design systems shipped products 34% faster with fewer visual bugs.

climax.text: Today, Apple, IBM, Atlassian, and Salesforce all maintain public design systems.

punchline.text: Scale doesn't kill consistency. Bad systems do.

quiz.question: What is the main purpose of a design system?
options: To ensure visual consistency at scale
